title: The Shrinking Lover
description: The Shrinking Lover tells the story of Alfredo, who begins to shrink in size after ingesting his lover Amparo’s weight loss experiment.
altHero: a woman, Amparo, lies in bed and talks with a tiny man, Alfredo
alt1: Alfredo watching Amparo work in her science lab
alt2: an uncertain Amparo watches Alfredo drink a sample from a beaker
alt3: Alfredo, already shrinking to the size of a child, leaves with two suitcases that are very large for him to carry
alt4: closeup of mini Alfredo looking guilty, Amparo is sleeping in the background
